entry.title: RT Nathan Howard: Learned a ton from this conversation with @reegannotraygan and @alpinechicken. Options are a critical tool for expressing financial ...
entry.summary: RT Nathan Howard Learned a ton from this conversation with @reegannotraygan and @alpinechicken. Options are a critical tool for expressing financial views in a market and we’re barely scratching the surface for how that will look on-chain. DeFi Pulse: 🧱 Did you miss the latest Money Legos featuring the @opyn_ team? Watch the full replay! Here is what we covered: ❓ How retail users utilize options 💡 DeFi vs. Tradfi options innovation 💫 Composability of options 👥 Opyn user growth Press ▶️ : https://youtu.be/8aShXRkalMg

entry.title: Re Squeeth (standing for squared eth) is the first on-chain power perpetual. It’s similar to an option, but without expiries or strike prices, and en...
entry.summary: Re Squeeth (standing for squared eth) is the first on-chain power perpetual. It’s similar to an option, but without expiries or strike prices, and enables no liquidations for longs. Squeeth is an ERC20 token that tracks the price of ETH, raised to the power of two.

entry.title: Re This year, the team has turned its focus to what they endearingly call “squeeth.”

entry.title: Re Opyn laid the foundation for options infrastructure in DeFi when they launched as the first options protocol. Opyn’s goal then and now has remaine...
entry.summary: Re Opyn laid the foundation for options infrastructure in DeFi when they launched as the first options protocol. Opyn’s goal then and now has remained the same: to empower others through an inclusive, fair, and open financial system.

entry.summary: 👀 A new feature is live in Beta! Users can now look up ANY Ethereum address on DeFi Pulse. Simply enter an address or ENS name in the search bar to see holdings data, including the total value, asset value share, & value by token. 🔍 Look up an address: https://www.defipulse.com/

entry.title: ⚡@Flashstake is now listed on DeFi Pulse! The Flashstake protocol allows users to receive yield on deposited assets instantly w/ a fixed rate over a ...
entry.summary: ⚡@Flashstake is now listed on DeFi Pulse! The Flashstake protocol allows users to receive yield on deposited assets instantly w/ a fixed rate over a set duration. Check out the listing: https://bit.ly/flashstake
